consent.consentDeclarationText: You declare that you have read the foregoing and give your consent, to the extent necessary, to the content of this paragraph.
consent.optionalCommunicationsLabelText: You wish to be kept informed of the Operator's commercial and social activities by means of electronic communications (SMS, e-mail, social networks...). You will have the option to unsubscribe at any time.

pdf.title: Privacy Policy
pdf.mainDeclaration: You declare that you have read the foregoing and give your consent, to the extent necessary, to the content of this paragraph.

alert.mandatoryCheckboxRequired: - The mandatory consent box must be checked.
alert.pdfUploadError: Error uploading the PDF to the server:
